cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 15th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 15th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: George, our cool coastal caravan is a lovely private cosy caravan set up. George overlooks the beautiful Karikari Beach and is a 10-minute drive to some of the Far Norths most stunning beaches.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 3 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: The Puwheke room is a cute single nicely presented room with quality linen, a bedside table, chest of draws, and wardrobe.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The Maitai room is a lovely well appointed room with a Queen size bed. bedside tables, reading chair, storage box, chest of draws, chromecast TV, and double wardrobe.

privates.name: Deluxe 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The Pohutukawa Cabin is an open plan self contained Cabin with its own walk around full Bathroom.The Cabin sleeps up to two people on a comfortable Queen size bed.There is extensive decking,an undercover BBQ area with free use of the BBQ,gas supplied.
